Description: Body sherd (mended from two fragments) of Chian Mature Animal Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior glazed streaky black; exterior: painted decoration consisting of possible sphinx or lion (trace of rump remaining; added red on haunch) to left; rosette as filling ornament.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0431) (phase 2)
